arabic: إِنَّمَا الأَعْمَالُ بِالنِّيَّاتِ، وَإِنَّمَا لِكُلِّ امْرِئٍ مَا نَوَى.
translation: Actions are but by intentions, and every man shall have but that which he intended.

arabic: الدِّينُ النَّصِيحَةُ.
translation: Religion is advice.

arabic: لا يُؤْمِنُ أَحَدُكُمْ حَتَّى يُحِبَّ لأَخِيهِ مَا يُحِبُّ لِنَفْسِهِ.
translation: None of you will believe until you love for your brother what you love for yourself.

arabic: مَنْ كَانَ يُؤْمِنُ بِاللَّهِ وَالْيَوْمِ الآخِرِ فَلْيَقُلْ خَيْرًا أَوْ لِيَصْمُتْ.
translation: Whoever believes in Allah and the Last Day, let him speak good or else keep silent.

arabic: الْكَلِمَةُ الطَّيِّبَةُ صَدَقَةٌ.
translation: A good word is a form of charity.

arabic: اتَّقِ اللَّهَ حَيْثُمَا كُنْتَ.
translation: Fear Allah wherever you are.

arabic: خَيْرُكُمْ مَنْ تَعَلَّمَ الْقُرْآنَ وَعَلَّمَهُ.
translation: The best of you are those who learn the Qur'an and teach it.

arabic: مَنْ سَلَكَ طَرِيقًا يَلْتَمِسُ فِيهِ عِلْمًا سَهَّلَ اللَّهُ لَهُ بِهِ طَرِيقًا إِلَى الْجَنَّةِ.
translation: Whoever follows a path in the pursuit of knowledge, Allah will make a path to Paradise easy for him.

arabic: لاَ تَغْضَبْ وَلَكَ الْجَنَّةُ.
translation: Do not become angry and Paradise will be yours.

arabic: تَبَسُّمُكَ فِي وَجْهِ أَخِيكَ لَكَ صَدَقَةٌ.
translation: Your smiling in the face of your brother is a charity.

arabic: إِنَّ اللَّهَ لاَ يَنْظُرُ إِلَى صُوَرِكُمْ وَأَمْوَالِكُمْ، وَلَكِنْ يَنْظُرُ إِلَى قُلُوبِكُمْ وَأَعْمَالِكُمْ.
translation: Allah does not look at your forms or your wealth, but He looks at your hearts and your deeds.

arabic: مَنْ غَشَّنَا فَلَيْسَ مِنَّا.
translation: Whoever cheats us is not one of us.

arabic: الْحَيَاءُ شُعْبَةٌ مِنَ الإِيمَانِ.
translation: Modesty is a branch of faith.

arabic: أَحَبُّ الْكَلاَمِ إِلَى اللَّهِ أَرْبَعٌ: سُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ، وَالْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ، وَلاَ إِلَهَ إِلاَّ اللَّهُ، وَاللَّهُ أَكْبَرُ.
translation: The most beloved words to Allah are four: Subhan-Allah, Al-hamdu-lillah, La ilaha illa-Allah, and Allahu Akbar.

arabic: أَفْضَلُ الذِّكْرِ لاَ إِلَهَ إِلاَّ اللَّهُ.
translation: The best remembrance is 'La ilaha illa-Allah' (there is no god but Allah).

arabic: مَنْ قَرَأَ حَرْفًا مِنْ كِتَابِ اللَّهِ فَلَهُ بِهِ حَسَنَةٌ، وَالْحَسَنَةُ بِعَشْرِ أَمْثَالِهَا.
translation: Whoever reads a letter from the Book of Allah, he will have a reward, and this reward will be multiplied by ten.

arabic: إِذَا مَاتَ الإِنْسَانُ انْقَطَعَ عَنْهُ عَمَلُهُ إِلاَّ مِنْ ثَلاَثَةٍ: إِلاَّ مِنْ صَدَقَةٍ جَارِيَةٍ، أَوْ عِلْمٍ يُنْتَفَعُ بِهِ، أَوْ وَلَدٍ صَالِحٍ يَدْعُو لَهُ.
translation: When a man dies, his deeds come to an end except for three things: Sadaqah Jariyah (ceaseless charity); a knowledge which is beneficial, or a virtuous descendant who prays for him.

arabic: لاَ يَدْخُلُ الْجَنَّةَ قَاطِعُ رَحِمٍ.
translation: The one who severs the ties of kinship will not enter Paradise.

arabic: مَنْ صَلَّى عَلَىَّ صَلاَةً صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ بِهَا عَشْرًا.
translation: Whoever sends blessings upon me once, Allah will send blessings upon him ten times.

arabic: كُلُّ مَعْرُوفٍ صَدَقَةٌ.
translation: Every good deed is a charity.
